name: Chicken Burger
description: Well seasoned chicken breast fillet between a fresh bun, garnished by fresh salad.
method: Preheat either with an over or a cast iron grill.
Either flatten or butterfly a chicken breast fillet.
Season the chicken well with your choice of spices. I recommend salt, pepper, garlic powder and paprika.
Start preparing your salad. Shred the lettuce and slice the tomatoes. Add any other type of salad you want!
Slice your bun in half whilst you wait. This is also a good time to clean up your chopping board and knife.
Flip your chicken over once it is half-way cooked. Add more seasoning if you wish.
Once your chicken has finished cooking, take it off the heat and leave it to rest.
Use your chosen cooking appliance to toast your buns. Keep an eye on them to ensure they don't burn.
Once your buns have toasted remove them from the heat and leave them to cool.
Once cooled, start building your burger. Don't forget to add the mayonnaise when you finish.
